title: a century symbol
content:
Hi everyone

I think this may be a silly question but...... I'm just looking for a century symbol? Not sure if thats clear but its the C sort of shape used to represent a Century. Does anyone know of a font that has one of these or are they usually hand done?

Thanks!!
author: amyloo

comments.content: I don't know exactly what a century symbol would look like. Do you have an example, or could you draw one to help us out? Unless everyone else knows what it is.
